We strive to be Earth\u2019s most customer-centric company, Earth\u2019s best employer, and Earth\u2019s safest place to work.Explore moreWhat We DoWorking at AmazonLeadership PrinciplesShareholder LettersReportsAmazon is increasing the average total compensation package for fulfillment and transportation employees in the US to over $29 per hourOur biggest ever investment in pay and benefits\u2014a total of more than $2.2 billion across our network.WorkplaceCEO Andy Jassy\u2019s 2024 Letter to ShareholdersRead Amazon CEO Andy Jassy\u2019s 2024 Letter to Shareholders.Company newsAmazon CEO Andy Jassy explains 8 things you may not know about the company\u2019s Leadership PrinciplesAmazon\u2019s Leadership Principles are full of nuances. Our CEO explains some of the most challenging ones to get right.Workplace1 / 3Amazon\u2019s \u201cDay 1\u201d mentality is our approach to doing everything with the energy and entrepreneurial spirit of a new organization on its first day.Working to earn and keep our customers\u2019 trust is the single biggest driver of Amazon\u2019s Day 1 approach. Amazon\u2019s decision-making process asks employees to consider whether an action is a one-way door\u2014consequential and nearly irreversible\u2014or a two-way door, easy to change course and go back. Discover more about who we are through our Leadership Principles.Learn more about usWhat We DoWhat We DoWhile our business has evolved over the years, one constant is customers\u2019 desire for lower prices, better selection, and convenient services.Working at AmazonWorking at AmazonOur workplace is made up of a talented, global team of individuals who work hard every day to create a great experience for customers, employees, partners, and the communities where we serve.Leadership PrinciplesLeadership PrinciplesAmazon employees use the Leadership Principles every day as we\u2019re discussing new projects, deciding on the best solution for a customer's problem, or interviewing candidates. ReportsReportsLearn more about our support of employees and small businesses, and our efforts to build stronger communities and protect the planet.Senior Leadership TeamSenior Leadership TeamMeet the members who make up our senior leadership team.Our PositionsOur PositionsWe want to provide customers, investors, policymakers, employees, and others our views on certain issues. Public PolicyPublic PolicyWe engage with policymakers on a wide range of issues that are important to our customers and employees. Learn more about our views on current policy issues.Awards and RecognitionAwards and RecognitionWe\u2019re honored to be recognized for the work we do on behalf of our customers, employees, and communities around the world. Shareholder LettersShareholder LettersRead the most recent letters to Amazon's shareholders from our CEO.We invest in the success of our employeesAmazon will spend over $1.2 billion to provide free skills training to employees\u2014helping them further their careers in tech and in-demand roles such as cloud computing. Learn more about how we help our employees grow their skills and careers.Latest newsPreview some of the best Prime Day deals available July 8-11Preview some of the best Prime Day deals available July 8-11Prime members can shop millions of deals July 8\u201311 across more than 35 categories including apparel, beauty, and home, with up to 50% off select products from Levi\u2019s, Elemis, and Shark.Retail July 10, 2025\u2018Superman\u2019 early screenings are available for Prime members\u2018Superman\u2019 early screenings are available for Prime membersFans of the eagerly anticipated DC Studios film can catch \u2018Superman\u2019 three days before its wide release.Retail July 8, 202517 of the best early Prime Day 2025 deals you can shop right now17 of the best early Prime Day 2025 deals you can shop right nowEnjoy early access to some of the best deals ahead of Prime Day 2025, which is returning July 8\u201311.Retail July 8, 2025Prime Day is back July 8-11, with double the days and millions of dealsPrime Day is back July 8-11, with double the days and millions of dealsShop Amazon\u2019s lowest prices of the year so far from top brands like Sony, Dyson, and Living Proof, along with Prime Day deals from exciting new-to-Amazon brands like Unwell Hydration, Tarte Cosmetics, and Away.Retail July 8, 2025Amazon has upskilled over 700,000 employees globally through prepaid education and training programsAmazon has upskilled over 700,000 employees globally through prepaid education and training programsAmazon is enhancing its Career Choice education program globally and launching new robotics apprenticeships in the U.S.WorkplaceJuly 1, 2025Score big with Prime for Young Adults\u2014the discounted Prime membership with limited time 5% cash backScore big with Prime for Young Adults\u2014the discounted Prime membership with limited time 5% cash backLearn about the extraordinary value of the go-to Prime membership for 18-to-24-year-olds. Eligible new members can try it for six months for $0 and earn 10% cash back for Prime Day.Retail June 30, 2025Watch: LeBron James announces Prime Day 2025 dates in a new Amazon commercialWatch: LeBron James announces Prime Day 2025 dates in a new Amazon commercialThe NBA icon announces that Prime Day is back July 8-11.Retail June 30, 2025Amazon MGM Studios sets Denis Villeneuve as director of next James Bond film Amazon MGM Studios sets Denis Villeneuve as director of next James Bond film Amazon MGM Studios today announced that Denis Villeneuve will direct the next James Bond film. Additionally, Tanya Lapointe will serve as executive producer.
